name: memory-box-mvp-v1
description: Memory Box MVP - Admin Panel, Landing Page, and Main App

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:admin && npm run install:landing && npm run install:app
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:admin && npm run build:landing && npm run build:app
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build:all && npm run deploy:admin && npm run deploy:landing && npm run deploy:app
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules admin/node_modules landing/node_modules app/node_modules shared/node_modules
scripts.status: echo 'Memory Box MVP v1 - Status Check' && npm run check:admin && npm run check:landing && npm run check:app
